abstract: Federal Reserve reports that manufacturing output in United States slipped 0.2 percent in May and that overall industrial production fell same amount in the month.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve said Monday that manufacturing output declined 0.2 percent last month.

headline.main: Factory Output Slips, Held Back by Higher Oil Prices and a Stronger Dollar
headline.print_headline: Oil Refining Cuts Hurt Factory Output

snippet: The Federal Reserve said Monday that manufacturing output declined 0.2 percent last month.
